00001 from copy import deepcopy
00002 
00003 def setInherit(c1, c2, c1_from_p1, c2_from_p1, p1Len, p2Len):
00004     c1.from_p1 = c1_from_p1/float(p1Len)
00005     c1.from_p2 = 1. - c1.from_p1
00006 
00007     c2.from_p1 = c2_from_p1/float(p2Len)
00008     c2.from_p2 = 1. - c2.from_p1
00009 
00010 
00011 def simple(p1, p2, prob, points, random):
00012     genlen = len(p1.genome)
00013     if random.random() < prob:
00014         xoPoints = list(set([random.randint(0, genlen-1) for i in xrange(points)]))
00015         xoPoints.sort(reverse=True)
00016 
00017         swapPoint = xoPoints.pop()
00018         swap = False
00019         c1Genome, c2Genome = [], []
00020         c1_from_p1 = 0
00021         c2_from_p1 = 0
00022         for i in xrange(0, genlen):
00023             if i == swapPoint:
00024                 swap = not swap
00025                 if xoPoints: swapPoint = xoPoints.pop()
00026 
00027             if swap:
00028                 c2_from_p1 += 1
00029                 c2Genome.append(p1.genome[i])
00030                 c1Genome.append(p2.genome[i])
00031             else:
00032                 c1_from_p1 += 1
00033                 c1Genome.append(p1.genome[i])
00034                 c2Genome.append(p2.genome[i])
00035 
00036         c1 = deepcopy(p1)
00037         c2 = deepcopy(p2)
00038         c1.genome = c1Genome
00039         c2.genome = c2Genome
00040 
00041         setInherit(c1, c2, c1_from_p1, c2_from_p1, genlen, genlen)
00042 
00043     else:
00044         c1 = deepcopy(p1)
00045         c2 = deepcopy(p2)
00046 
00047     return (c1, c2)
